definition: to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: He gave all these people these bad rules.
sentences.chinese: 他給人們下達邪惡的指令。

sentences.english: The division headquarters was ordered to issue the evacuation was ordered.
sentences.chinese: 師部奉命下達大撤退的命令。

sentences.english: The manager has been batting around all morning, giving instructions to every department.
sentences.chinese: 經理奔波了一個上午，給各部門下達指示。

sentences.english: Cintron yelled orders over the squall.
sentences.chinese: 辛特龍在狂風中大聲下達命令。

sentences.english: Murray canceled the attacks to be made by Roise and Taplett.
sentences.chinese: 默雷取消了下達給羅伊斯和泰伯利特的進攻命令。

sentences.english: Performs any other duty as assigned by the General Manager.
sentences.chinese: 完成總經理下達的任務。
然而，法院下達的命令有時候會凌駕於這條規定。

sentences.english: In the department issued task list, responsible for complete with push plans until finish.
sentences.chinese: 在部門任務單下達後，負責跟催計劃直至完成。

sentences.english: Buzzers were later used at all the guns to give the signal for firing.
sentences.chinese: 後來就給各炮安裝下達開火令的響鈴。

sentences.english: They need to give them (Tom Hicks and George Gillett) some ultimatums.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要給高層們下達最後通牒。

sentences.english: Perform any duties assigned by the Management deemed necessary.
sentences.chinese: 執行任何管理層下達的任務。

sentences.english: To confirm and accept production plans issued by LG.
sentences.chinese: 確認由計劃供應部下達的生產計劃。

sentences.english: He ordered his men to attack as soon as reinforcements arrived.
sentences.chinese: 他下達命令，指示手下增援一到，馬上進攻。

sentences.english: The Air Commodore briefed the bomber crew on their dangerous mission.
sentences.chinese: 空軍准將向轟炸機機組下達執行危險義務的各項指示。

sentences.english: After the assembly, they gave us our assignments.
sentences.chinese: 會後，“公司”給我們下達了任務。

sentences.english: The soldiers responded eagerly to the orders.

definition: to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
